name: Zodiac (Incentive Software)
overview: Zodiac is a graphic text adventure where a picture shows your surroundings while a text describes what you see. You type in commands to solve puzzles and complete tasks. Zodiac An evil wizard, Ramus wants to destroy your tribe and must be stopped. An old man has studied some scriptures and has realised the only way to stop the evil threat is to collect the signs of the Zodiac so they can be used to destroy Ramus. You have been tasked to explore the land and find the signs. Published in a double game pack with The Search for the Secret of Life.
